name: Fjogel Rampage
description:
Play as the Fjogel and go on a poo rampage! Hit as many people you can while avoiding the anti-fjogel missiles! Steal the dropped balloons from the children to gain an extra life!

Fjogel Rampage is the first of many games I will be making! The game is synced with Gamejolts leaderboards and I will update it more with trophies and such, expanding the game world and adding more stuff to poo on.
